item.title: Little Known Ways to Ruby Mastery by Ian Dees
item.dc:creator: Victor Goff
item.content:encoded:
RubyLearning.org continues to Interview the "Ruby Masters" where views and opinions, guidance, and even sometimes the future comes to light.

You can find the interview from Ian Dees atÂ http://rubylearning.com/blog/2008/11/18/little-known-ways-to-ruby-mastery-by-ian-dees/.

This week, my none of my questions were featured, but I think you will enjoy it in any case!

Enjoy!
